body.name: Jack & Rose Travel Mirror with Light, Travel Makeup Mirror with Magnification, Adjustable Height and Angle, Portable Folding Mirror
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 15. Order within 6 hrs 9 mins
features: Travel Mirror: The ultra-thin, light, and compact design of this travel makeup mirror will make you love it when traveling.The overall size is 8.03*5.28inch, and the folded thickness is 0.63inch. You can easily put it into your handbag or luggage for perfect travel use.

3 Color Lights: This makeup mirror has 72 LED lights, and you can freely switch between three modes: soft warm color, neutral white, and natural daylight. You can select a desired color to avoid embarrassing situation for makeup.The touch screen on the mirror can brighten or darken the mirror, simulating different scenes such as day and night.

5X Magnifying Mirror: Package included a 5x magnifying mirror, which let you see every detail clearly, ensuring every detail of your makeup is perfect, suitable for eyeliner, eyebrows, lipstick; 75-90 degree free rotation angle, you can easily find the vanity mirror angle you want.

Rechargeable Makeup Mirror with Light: The makeup mirror has a built-in 1000mAh rechargeable battery, which can work 80-150min after being fully charged. The charging port of the rechargeable USB vanity mirror is a USB-A port, which is suitable for computers, mobile power supplies, ordinary sockets, etc.

Gift for Women: It’s boxed very nicely! This is a gift for you to express your love and affection, perfect for girlfriends or close ones. Valentine's Day decor for girlfriend, family, or wife. I highly recommend this mirror set for travel or everyday.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this mirror it’s so compact and perfect for travel. Not too heavy and the light is great. The one downside is the magnifying mirror is kinda useless; it’s just a separate piece so you can’t like attach it to the big mirror or anything. But overall great product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: love the quality, size, lightness, easy to use. perfect for travel or as a desk mirror

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great adjustable height, wish it also comes in 5x magnification.
reviews.reviewText: Really like that it folds with the mirror inside and well protected. Used on a table with regular height, the adjustable height basically brings it to face level comfortably. Extended almost to maximum, without something to weigh the base down, it does topple over. I just placed my hair brush on the base, no problem.My only wish is that it also comes in 5x or 7x, the whole mirror that is. I would love to have that. This way I can travel with two mirror, one regular and the other 5x or 7x magnification.The small 5x mirror is not really helpful. Another brand has the magnetic feature so the small magnifying mirror attached itself to th main mirror. But it doesn't have the great adjustable, as much as this one, feature, plus the magnetic feature just adds weight.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great Mirror for traveling of at home. Nice Bright light and magnification.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I just like it A LOT
reviews.reviewText: Nicely maid. Thin, so will pack Nicely. The light is bright

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I travel often and getting ready isn't always easy with dimly lit hotel rooms. This item is so convenient to have, portable, and perfect. Love the adjustable height as well. Only thing I wish is that in came in different colors because white can get dirty easily. It's perfect otherwise.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The hype is real
reviews.reviewText: I can’t remember where I saw this but it was one of the social medias and lord, that child did not lie. She did not need a fancy mirror as she was 12 and perfect but this thing is good for the older ladies too. The light is perfect, the ability to bend it to my will. Omg! Just do it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars I WAS SO EXCITED FOR THIS MIRROR...
reviews.reviewText: I was so excited for this mirror. Paid extra for it because it has adjustable height. However, I was only able to use it ONCE then it stopped working! I bought this extra early for my trip and didn't use it till my trip besides the occasional charging and testing to make sure it works. I took it on my 2 week European trip only to have it die on me on the first morning there! I turned on then sputtered and shut off and refused to turn on again even after charging! What a waste of my money! I didn't get the other less expensive mirrors because I so liked the adjustable height feature but had I known it would only work, essentially, for one use only I wouldn't have bothered. And since I didn't use it till after the return period, I wasn't able to return it! Beware guys!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Light stopped working after three months. Disappointing.
